name: Sky-Trader Fleets
description: Nomadic clans living entirely on Aether-Skiffs, acting as the global commerce lifeline between major powers and remote settlements.

name: Shatterland Clans
description: Hardy, often violent tribes of scavengers and raiders inhabiting the dangerous Shatterlands.

name: Warden Clans
description: Secretive, isolated communities dedicated to guarding the prisons of the twelve Chaos Dragons.

name: Wind-Rider Nomads
description: Avian and insectoid clans taming giant flying beasts, living nomadically in high skies and nesting on remote mountains.

name: The Canopy Clans
description: Tree-dwelling societies in colossal forests, building cities in branches connected by rope bridges and zip lines.

name: The Mycelial Conclaves
description: Communities of sentient fungi in sprawling, semi-subterranean networks, communicating through a shared consciousness and masters of alchemy and poison.

name: The River-Folk
description: Amphibious and reptilian clans dominating great river systems as traders, fishers, and sometimes pirates.

name: The Scrap-Baronies of the Wastes
description: Warlords in the Shatterlands carving out kingdoms from salvaged ancient war machines, ruling over scrapper tribes.
